column2: Overall the regional ODLN met my learning objectives

column4: I can apply new knowledge and skills to solve open data implementation challenges
column5: I have developed useful contacts and know where to go for access tools/support

column7: Success stories of open data in the world, Managing change in government, Open data Masterclass

column8: Monitoring and enabling practical use of open data by ministries and agencies
column9: More practical cases from different parts of the world( Africa, Latin America for example)
The event was too short and should have lasted at least a couple more days
